segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice the water pouring everywhere?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the puddle, but she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she’s just polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s even aware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading fast, and she’s just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she looks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she’s completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to end badly if she doesn’t turn around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone stops her before the whole kitchen floods.
segments.speaker: PAR
